features: MOROCCAN ARGAN OIL: This moisturizing shampoo and conditioner set from Pure Nature Lux Spa is powered with hydrating argan oil, used for centuries to achieve incredible shine and make hair manageable; This Moroccan oil shampoo and conditioner gives you silky smooth hair and helps prevent damage; When you need an argan oil shampoo and conditioner that won’t disappoint, trust only Pure Nature Lux Spa

SULFATE FREE: It’s time to say goodbye to your old anti frizz shampoo and conditioner packed with harsh ingredients that can strip moisture and treat yourself to a gentler experience; Our Moroccan argan sulfate free shampoo and conditioner keeps hair hydrated; Better still Pure Nature Lux Spa’s argan oil conditioner and shampoo contains no parabens and is never tested on animals

SHINE FOR ALL HAIR TYPES: More than simply a shampoo and conditioner set for curly hair, our conditioner and shampoo sulfate free solution restores shine for everyone; Experience sleek, silky locks that shine effortlessly thanks to this hydrating shampoo and conditioner for straight, wavy, curly and even frizzy hair

SALON GRADE: Upgrade to an argan oil shampoo and conditioner set trusted by professionals; Our Moroccan argan oil shampoo and conditioner is salon grade excellence, developed by hair care experts; When you need a salon shampoo and conditioner set, trust only Pure Nature Lux Spa

RESTORES AND PROTECTS: Reverse damage, repair dryness and help prevent split ends with our conditioner and shampoo for dry hair; The secret to our shampoo and conditioner set for dry damaged hair is how the argan oil creates a protective coating around each strand, penetrating on a cellular level to provide hydration and repair from the inside out

Professional Salon Grade Upgrade your hair care routine to a professional grade argan oil shampoo and conditioner formulated by salon experts to boost shine and trap moisture. Advanced Damage Repair The argan oil in this conditioner and shampoo for dry hair penetrates on a cellular level to reverse the signs of damage. Say goodbye to split ends. Incredible Protection & Shine Our sulfate free shampoo and conditioner creates amazing shine with a protective coating of argan oil. Guard each strand against damage from exposure. For All Types of Hair Pure Nature Lux Spa’s argan shampoo and conditioner set is formulated to boost shine and protect straight, curly, frizzy and even wavy hair.

My hair feels dense and rough. Will this help? Yes. The blend of argan oils and other botanical ingredients like chamomile, rosemary and jojoba have been hand-selected for their smoothing properties. Our shampoo and conditioner boost the softness and manageability of your hair with every wash. I have curly hair and want to keep the body and fullness. Will the oils weigh it down? No. In fact, most people report that their hair does not feel oily and actually looks fuller after washing with our argan shampoo&conditioner set. Our argan oil products are perfect for all hair types, including curly, straight, wavy and even frizzy. My hair is damaged by the sun and hot irons. Will this help? Absolutely. Our Moroccan argan oil set actively works to reverse damage and prevent it in the future. The secret is how the argan oil and keratin penetrates each strand on a cellular level, creating a protective coating that nourishes from within. Is the shampoo and conditioner safe to use with color treated and bleached hair? Our shampoo and conditioner for dry hair is perfectly safe to use with hair that has been bleached or color treated. It is specially formulated to not strip your hair of color or create any tonal imbalance. How often should I use the shampoo and conditioner? Our argan shampoo and conditioner can be used daily if desired. The oils help replenish stressed out, dry hair and provide nourishment to each strand. For best results leave the products in your hair for a few minutes before rinsing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Shiny and smooth
reviews.reviewText: Wow works great and a little goes along way, about half a pump is all that’s needed. Great smell and provides great softness to hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best shampoo and conditioner ever used! My hair is fine so I do reverse washing. I love it! Soft shiny no breakage. No handful of hair! Thank you! Also smells yummy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This set leave my hair soft and shiny. The best shampoo and conditioner. I have African hair and they leave it smooth and beautiful. I recommend it 100%

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works well. A little goes a long way. Creates soft silky hair. Not a fan of the grapefruity scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never using different product again!
reviews.reviewText: These haircare products are the absolute best! Leaves your hair feeling soft, silky, and smelling great! No oil build up or residue. Will never use a different haircare again. Customer for life!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great moisturizing shampoo/conditioner
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for granddaughter who's hair is super thick and tangles badly. She says the shampoo and conditioner really helps. She can now brush her hair with crying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this and thought it was okay. Nothing too fancy or anything. Wasn’t my favorite and went through it fast (my hair is medium length)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 3 year user- saved my hair
reviews.reviewText: I love this stuff! I have very frizzy & dry & curly hair. This shampoo & conditioner hydrates & repairs & helps with frizz. It brought out my natural curls that I haven’t had since I was a child!Will continue to be a user 🤗
Me deja el cabello suave y terso tiene un olor muy agradable me gusto mucho

reviews.reviewTitle: Very good shampoo. It made my hairs very silky and ...
reviews.reviewText: Very good shampoo. It made my hairs very silky and smooth. They look so beautiful now . I am just loving it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Seller refunded the money upon my writing to him
reviews.reviewText: The seller refunded the money in full as the shampoo bottle top had broken and had leaked as well. I transferred the contents to another shampoo bottle i had. The shampoo us very good and i find it keeps my hair soft and shiny. I would buy the product again once my stock will be over. I have used a lot of different shampoos for singapore weather, and this one is good.Appreciate the seller’s gesture to refund the money. Good customer values. Wishing luck n success.
Estuve esperando unos meses y al fin le hicieron un buen descuento, recomiendo ampliamente el producto deja el pelo muy suave e hidratado.
Deja el cabello suave y manejable
